comments.author: alessandra
comments.content: Never ate jicama, not even sure if I could find it here! I am corious!

comments.author: Otehlia Cassidy
comments.content: This might be the perfect solution to the bunch of radishes I have in my fridge. I love jicama, and the bite of radish seems like a great compliment.

comments.author: marlene
comments.content: I always serve Jicama at dinnertime sliced in sticks with a squeeze of lemon on top. My whole family wipes it out right away. Its healthy and low calorie. I am going to try this salad this weekend!
